title: "KW development bank" UX prototype
desc: KW Development Bank is a financial service application that has been developed to cater to the financial needs of the users of Waterloo and Kitchener regions of Ontario, Canada. This application provides a range of financial services such as card management, money transfer, financial investment, and many more.
